thread.title: BRIEF-Harvard Bioscience Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Harvard Bioscience Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Harvard Bioscience Inc:
* HARVARD BIOSCIENCE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS
* SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $0.19 TO $0.23
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE ABOUT $0.03 TO $0.07
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $118 MILLION TO $123 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 4 PERCENT TO $27.5 MILLION * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 * ‍HARVARD BIOSCIENCE IS REAFFIRMING ITS FINANCIAL GUIDANCE FOR FULL YEAR 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
